did.unittitle: Timberville, Virginia Automotive Repair Shop Ledger 1924-1926
did.abstract: Accounts ledger for an unidentified automotive repair shop in Timberville, Virginia, containing customer names together with itemized charges for parts and services on repairs and maintenance.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Timberville, Virginia Automotive Repair Shop Ledger must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Timberville, Virginia Automotive Repair Shop Ledger, Ms2008-017 - Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Timberville, Virginia Automotive Repair Shop Ledger was purchased by Special Collections in 2008.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing and description of the Timberville Virginia Automotive Repair Shop Ledger commenced and was completed in April 2008.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: The 1917 edition of the Virginia Business Directory and Gazetteer lists only one auto shop in Timberville, a business owned by H. E. Brill. Whether the ledger held in this collection belonged to Brill's shop is unknown, and no further information is available at this time.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the accounts ledger of an unidentified automotive repair shop in Timberville, Virginia during the 1920s. The ledger contains customer names, together with itemized descriptions for parts and labor on automobile repair and maintenance, including fuel charges. Preceding the accounts is an index to customer names M-Z (the cover and index pages A-L are lacking).
